input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: ORŁY COMMUNE. Summary: Granting a Long-Term Loan in the Amount of Pln 5,000,000.00. Description: The subject of the order is to grant a long-term loan in the amount of PLN 5,000,000.00 with the following characteristics:<br> a) the loan repayment will be secured only by a blank promissory note together with a promissory note declaration, with the countersignature of the Commune Treasurer on these documents,<br> b) the loan will be disbursed at the borrower's written instruction, in the form of a transfer, in tranches, to the indicated bank account within the period from the date of signing the agreement to December 31, 2025,<br> c) The Ordering Party reserves the right not to use the full loan amount,<br> d) it is possible to change the amount and launch date credit.<br> The Ordering Party will inform the Contractor about the amount and date of payment of a given loan tranche 3 days before the loan disbursement,<br> e) repayment of capital in Polish zlotys will take place on the quarterly dates specified in Annex No. 6 to the SWZ (document entitled "Loan repayment schedule for opinions", and then contracts,<br> f) The Ordering Party reserves the right to early repayment of capital or capital installment, without incurring any costs in this respect,<br> g) the loan interest accrual period will be directly proportional to the actual loan period,<br> h) repayment postponement is allowed loan or loan installments with prior written information to the Contractor and obtaining the Bank's consent,<br> The contractor will not charge any additional fees and provision.... Published Date: 2025-12-04. Closing Date: 2025-12-15. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: ZAKŁAD GOSPODARKI KOMUNLNEJ W OSTROW MAZOWIECKA SPOŁKA Z OGRANICZONĄ ODPOWIEDZIALNOŚCIĄ. Summary: Delivery in the Form of Operational Leasing of a New City Bus. Description: 1) The subject of the order is the delivery and financing in the form of operational leasing of a brand new city bus, including the purchase and transfer of ownership of the vehicle at the end of the leasing contract. The bus will be intended for public transport. Detailed technical requirements of the vehicle are included in Annex No. 4. - Description of the subject of the order.2) The scope of the order includes: a) the purchase of a new city bus with individual features that meet the parameters and equipment in accordance with Annex No. 4; b) handing over the city bus to the Ordering Party for use for a specified period, i.e. from delivery until the date of transfer of ownership; c) optional transfer of ownership of the city bus to the Ordering Party (based on the contract to be concluded within 30 days from the expiry of the leasing period, i.e. the date of payment of the last leasing installment, for the price presented in the offer Contractors). Published Date: 2025-12-03. Closing Date: 2025-12-10. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: GNOJNO COMMUNE. Summary: Granting a Long-Term Bank Loan to the Gnojno Commune in the Amount of Pln 893,285.00 to Finance the Planned Budget Deficit. Description: The subject of the order is: Granting a long-term bank loan to the Gnojno Commune in the amount of PLN 893,285.00 to finance the planned budget deficit 2. Terms of the loan: a). The loan will be disbursed once in the amount of PLN 893,285.00 after signing the contract with the Contractor. Ordering party reserves the right not to disburse the loan in full, which will not burden the Ordering Party with any additional costs. b). planned repayment period - December 31, 2041. The Ordering Party reserves the right to repay the loan earlier without additional commissions (costs). c). form of security - blank promissory note and a declaration of voluntary submission to enforcement.d). annual interest rate based on the WIBOR 3M rate increased by the bank's margin constant throughout the loan period. In order to facilitate the comparison of interest rate offers, please provide the WIBOR 3M rate as of December 1, 2025 and the bank's margin separately. To the contract The loan interest rate will be determined on the first day of the loan launch and will change every 3 months, starting from the first day of the loan launch.. Published Date: 2025-12-03. Closing Date: 2025-12-10. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Granting a Long-Term Bank Loan to the Gnojno Commune in the Amount of Pln 893,285.00 to Finance the Planned Budget Deficit
output.Description: The subject of the order is: Granting a long-term bank loan to the Gnojno Commune in the amount of PLN 893,285.00 to finance the planned budget deficit 2. Terms of the loan: a). The loan will be disbursed once in the amount of PLN 893,285.00 after signing the contract with the Contractor. Ordering party reserves the right not to disburse the loan in full, which will not burden the Ordering Party with any additional costs. b). planned repayment period - December 31, 2041. The Ordering Party reserves the right to repay the loan earlier without additional commissions (costs). c). form of security - blank promissory note and a declaration of voluntary submission to enforcement.d). annual interest rate based on the WIBOR 3M rate increased by the bank's margin constant throughout the loan period. In order to facilitate the comparison of interest rate offers, please provide the WIBOR 3M rate as of December 1, 2025 and the bank's margin separately. To the contract The loan interest rate will be determined on the first day of the loan launch and will change every 3 months, starting from the first day of the loan launch.

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: KOCZALA COMMUNE. Summary: Granting and Servicing a Long-Term Loan in Polish Currency up to Pln 2,000,000.00. Description: The subject of the order is the granting by an entity operating under Polish banking law of a long-term loan in PLN in the amount of up to PLN 2,000,000.00 (in words: two million zlotys 00/100).1. The loan will be used to finance the planned budget deficit and repayment in advance credits and loans taken out.2. The scope of the subject of the order includes granting a loan of up to PLN 2,000,000.00 paid in one tranche: The first tranche in the amount of PLN 2,000,000.00, in the fourth quarter of 2024 (until December 29, 2025).3. The loan will be taken out and repaid in Polish zlotys (PLN), and in the event of Poland's entry into the EURO zone, the loan will be converted without additional fees.4. The loan will be repaid in the years 2026-2034.5. Planned grace period for capital payment until March 30, 20266. The loan will be repaid in the period from March 31, 2026 to March 31, 2034, in the following amounts: March 31, 2026 - PLN 100,000.00; March 31, 2027 - PLN 100,000.00; March 31, 2028 - PLN 100,000.00; March 31, 2029 - PLN 100,000.00; March 31, 2030 - PLN 100,000.00; March 31, 2031 - PLN 150,000.00; May 31, 2031 - PLN 150,000.00; March 31, 2032 - PLN 250,000.00; 31..... Published Date: 2025-11-20. Closing Date: 2025-12-04. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Granting and Servicing a Long-Term Loan in Polish Currency up to Pln 2,000,000.00

The loan will be made available to the Ordering Party after signing the contract - no later than December 10, 2025. The loan will be used by December 31, 2025 (upon request), i.e. based on the Ordering Party's written instruction submitted 1 business day before the date of transfer of the loan funds to the Ordering Party's account. The Ordering Party reserves the right to disburse the loan in one or more tranches, no more than 4 tranches, depending on the Ordering Party's needs, in the maximum amount specified in the contract. Moreover, the Ordering Party reserves the right to use a loan in an amount lower than PLN 1,500,000.00, without incurring any additional fees, commissions or costs related to the preparation or provision of the uninitiated part of the loan, with provided that the minimum amount of the loan disbursed will be no less than PLN 100,000.00 and the Ordering Party has the right to early repayment of the loan, in whole or in part, without additional costs (fees, commissions, etc.). input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: CIECHANOW COMMUNE. Summary: Granting a Long-Term Loan in the Amount of Pln 4,394,245.97 to Finance the Planned Budget Deficit. Description: Detailed description of the subject of the order: 3.1. The subject of the order is to grant a long-term loan to the Ciechanow Commune in the amount of PLN 4,394,245.97 (in words: four million three hundred and ninety-four thousand, two hundred and forty-five zlotys 97/100) with a repayment period until November 29, 2030.3.2 Loan is intended to finance the planned budget deficit of the Ciechanw Commune 3.3. The loan will be disbursed in tranches: no3.4. Repayments of loan installments scheduled for 2026-2030 will be made in annual installments, by January 30 of each year according to the schedule. Last loan installment to November 29, 2030. Banking services include in particular:2.1. opening, maintaining and closing current and auxiliary bank accounts;2.2. execution of cash payments and withdrawals, in particular payments made to the Commune and organizational units by third parties;2.3. execution of transfers made to the Commune and organizational units;2.4. execution of transfers (to an account in the servicing bank or an account to another bank) on the day of their receipt, made from the accounts of the Commune and units organizational;2.5. mass payment services (identification and processing of mass payments based on a virtual account, providing the output file via the electronic banking system);2.6. preparing bank statements confirming the balance and financial operations performed on a given day, the Ordering Party allows the electronic form of the statements prepared;2.7. zeroing current and auxiliary accounts, in accordance with the instructions of unit managers, consisting in transferring the amount as of December 31 of each year remains.... Published Date: 2025-11-08. Closing Date: 2025-11-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Banking Services for the Budget of the Inowłodz Commune and Organizational Units in 2026-2028

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PORĄBKA COMMUNE. Summary: Granting the Porąbka Commune a Long-Term Loan in the Amount of Pln 1,000,000.00 to Finance the Planned Commune Budget Deficit.. Description: The subject of the order is to grant the Porbka Commune a long-term loan in the amount of PLN 1,000,000.00 to finance the planned budget deficit of the commune. The loan period is 109 months from the date of signing the contract, with a grace period in the repayment of the capital until January 30, 2026. will be made in 108 monthly installments, in the period from January 2026 to December 2034, and the interest will be payable on the dates of repayment of the capital installments. The loan will bear interest at a variable interest rate based on the WIBOR 1M index increased by the bank's fixed margin. The loan repayment will be secured by a bill of exchange in blank along with a declaration of bills of exchange. The Ordering Party does not allow fees or commissions other than those indicated in the offer. Detailed terms of the loan are specified in the Description of the Subject of the Order (Appendix No. 1 to SWZ No. ZP.271.1.21.2025).. Published Date: 2025-11-08. Closing Date: 2025-11-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Granting the Porąbka Commune a Long-Term Loan in the Amount of Pln 1,000,000.00 to Finance the Planned Commune Budget Deficit.

The subject of the order is the provision of a service consisting in comprehensive preparation and implementation of two study trips for representatives entities creating the West Pomeranian innovation ecosystem to European innovation centers.2. The Ordering Party assumes that study trips will be organized to European regions characterized by a high level of innovation (according to the European innovation scoreboard, the so-called Innovation Leaders and/or Strong Innovators). One of the study trips will take place to the Hovedstaden region (DK) and should include in its program, among others: study visits to science/innovation centers located there (e.g. Technical University of Denmark (DTU) and/or University of Copenhagen, etc.). The second study trip will take place to the Etel-Suomi (FI) region and its program should include, among others: study visits to science/innovation centers located there (e.g. University of Helsinki, South-Eastern Finland University of Applied Sciences, etc.).3. Currency type: PLN<br> 2. Loan amount: PLN 7,500,000.00.<br> 3. Loan period: until December 31, 2035 year.<br> 4. Grace period for repayment of loan installments: until September 30, 2026, i.e. until the date of repayment of the first loan installment.<br> 5. Purpose of the loan: to cover the planned budget deficit of the Pacyna Commune for 2025.<br> 6. Making the loan available: the loan will be transferred to the Ordering Party's bank account in tranches. The amounts and deadlines for transferring individual tranches will be reported by the Ordering Party during the term of the contract in the form of electronically sending a scan of a letter on this matter to the e-mail address provided by the Bank. The original of the above the letter will be sent to the Bank in parallel. Deadline collection of the loan by the Ordering Party expires on December 31, 2025.<br> 7. Loan security: The only form of loan security acceptable to the Ordering Party is a blank bill of exchange issued by the Pacyna Commune together with a bill of exchange declaration.<br> 8. Loan repayment dates:<br> Repayment date The first loan installment will be due on September 30, 2026 in the amount of PLN 150,000.00.<br> will take place on December 31, 2035.<br> The loan will be repaid in installments in accordance with Annex 1<br> 9.The loan interest rate is set at the WIBOR rate 3M p.... Detailed conditions for granting and repaying the loan: a) Loan currency: PLNb) Planned loan period from the loan launch to December 31, 2035. c) Interest repayment in quarterly periods for based on the Bank's notification. d) Interest on the loan will be charged for a full quarter on the actually used loan amount. Interest on the loan will be accrued quarterly and payable quarterly on the last business day of each quarter or by the 7th day of the next quarter starting from first quarter of loan disbursement. Repayment of the last interest is due on the day of full repayment of the loan.e) To determine the interest amount, a year of 365 days and the actual number of days in a month is assumed.f) In the case of repayment of the loan at an earlier date from here.... Published Date: 2025-11-01. Closing Date: 2025-11-14. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed
